    • Method Detail

      • createComponentEntry

        public static String createComponentEntry(ARServerUser context,
                                          String componentName,
                                          String componentType,
                                          String componentDescription,
                                          boolean status)
                                   throws ARException
        The function creates a new configuration component entry and returns the GUID for that entry.
        Parameters:
        context - : ARServerUser context
        componentName - : Name of the component to be created
        componentType - : Type of component com.bmc.arsys*
        status - : true : Creates the new component in active state false: creates the new component in inactive state.
        Returns:
        : GUID of the newly created component.
        Throws:
        ARException

      • updateOlderComponents

        public static void updateOlderComponents(ARServerUser context,
                                         String componentNamePrefix,
                                         String componentType,
                                         String description,
                                         boolean status)
                                  throws ARException
        Use this method to deactivate older Active components. The method will take the component Name as prefix while getting the entries to deactivate. Ensure that you are activating your component AFTER this method is called.
        Parameters:
        context -
        componentNamePrefix -
        componentType -
        description -
        status -
        Throws:
        ARException

        Throws:

      • getActiveComponent

        public static Entry getActiveComponent(ARServerUser context,
                                       String componentName,
                                       String componentType)
                                throws ARException
        Get the active component entry for a given component name and type. If there is not an active entry, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        context -
        componentName -
        componentType -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ARException

      • createSettingEntries

        public static int createSettingEntries(ARServerUser context,
                                       String componentGUID,
                                       String componentName,
                                       String componentType,
                                       List<String[]> nameValuePair)
                                throws ARException
        The function creates a new setting entry on "AR System Configuration Component Setting" form.
        Parameters:
        context - : ARServerUser context
        componentGUID - : Component GUID. If a NULL is passed here, a new component entry will get created
        componentName - : Component Name.
        componentType - : Component Type.
        nameValuePair - : List of Name value pairs.
        Returns:
        : Returns the number of entries created. If all entries are created, the count will be equal to the number of Name/Value pairs passed.
        Throws:
        ARException

      • setSettingEntries

        public static void setSettingEntries(ARServerUser context,
                                     String entryID,
                                     String componentGUID,
                                     String componentName,
                                     String componentType,
                                     String settingName,
                                     String settingValue)
                              throws ARException
        The function creates a new setting entry on "AR System Configuration Component Setting" form.
        Parameters:
        context - : ARServerUser context
        componentGUID - : Component GUID. If a NULL is passed here, a new component entry will get created
        componentName - : Component Name.
        componentType - : Component Type.
        nameValuePair - : List of Name value pairs.
        Throws:
        ARException

      • updateComponent

        public static void updateComponent(ARServerUser context,
                                   String componentGUID,
                                   String componentName,
                                   String componentType,
                                   String componentDescription,
                                   boolean status)
                            throws ARException
        This method can be used to update component values like name, type and description provided these fields are not null Status will always be updated This method will not update the GUID

        status -

      • updateOrCreateSetting

        public static void updateOrCreateSetting(ARServerUser context,
                                         String componentGUID,
                                         String componentName,
                                         String componentType,
                                         String settingName,
                                         String settingValue)
                                  throws ARException
        Only use this method if setting name is unique, will not work for duplicates as it will only update the first one
        Parameters:
        context -
        componentGUID -
        componentName -
        componentType -
        settingName -
        settingValue -
        Throws:
        ARException

      • deleteSetting

        public static boolean deleteSetting(ARServerUser context,
                                    String componentName,
                                    String componentType,
                                    String settingName,
                                    String settingValue)
                             throws ARException
        Delete settings entries that have a specific name and value.
        Parameters:
        context - the server connection
        componentName - the component name
        componentType - the component type
        settingName - the setting name
        settingValue - the setting value
        Returns:
        true if at least one entry was deleted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ARException
